author: Billy Perrigo
title: It Was Already Dangerous To Be Muslim in India. Then Came the Coronavirus
description: Some Indian Muslims have been accused without evidence of purposefully spreading the coronavirus as a kind of "biological Jihad"
content:
The Islamophobic hashtags began circulating shortly after the news broke in late March. 
Indian authorities had linked dozens of cases of COVID-19 to a Muslim missionary group that held its annual conference in Delhi in early March, and health officials were… [+8375 chars]
